node.statement: Topological extension to t=0: As t->0, the surgery necks shrink (lambda(t)->0) and edge roundings straighten, so K_t converges to K in the Hausdorff topology. The Hamiltonian diffeomorphisms Phi_t generating K_t satisfy |Phi_t - id|_{C^0} -> 0 on compact sets (since the generating Hamiltonians H_t -> 0 in C^0), providing uniform convergence to a homeomorphism Phi_0 with Phi_0(K_epsilon)=K. This gives the required topological isotopy on [0,1] with K_0=K.
